title: Evolur Aurora 5-In-1 Convertible Crib In Akoya Grey Pearl, Greenguard Gold Certified, Features 3 Mattress Height Settings, Sturdy And Spacious Baby Crib, Wooden Furniture
features: EXQUISITE CRAFTSMANSHIP - The Aurora is built out of Kiln-dried hardwood with fine veneers. A delicate design, an elegantly curved headboard, beautiful ribbon and bow detailed spindles and Queen Anne style feet, give it a feminine touch

5-in-1 CONVERTIBILITY - The Aurora converts to a toddler bed and daybed (conversion kit (sold separately) . Our wooden bed frame (sold separately) converts it into a full-size bed (with and without footboard). It also features 3-mattress height settings.
ALLURING FINISHES TO CHOOSE FROM - Explore a range of nursery themes as you choose from five different finishes. Go girlie, elegant, classic or glamorous as you pick from magical finishes.

SAFETY FIRST - Our cribs are built to the highest safety standards that meet/exceed those set by the CPSC, JPMA and ASTM. Each of our cribs undergoes rigorous testing by independent laboratories for compliance with all US and Canadian crib regulations.

A LIFETIME INVESTMENT - Pick coordinating pieces from our Evolur Aurora Collection - the double dresser, armoire, tall chest, hutch/bookcase and nightstand to create an ageless nursery that is every mother’s dream. Crib dimensions - 54″ L x 18″ W x 34″ H
description: Looking for inspiration to design that dreamy, fairytale nursery? Look no further than the Aurora Nursery Collection by Evolur. The perfect nursery collection for your little princess, the Evolur Aurora 5-in-1 Convertible Crib helps you create a magical space that looks as if taken straight from the pages of a fairytale book! A soft, delicate carving, detailed spindles, Queen Anne style feet, and intricate ribbon bow scrollwork makes it the perfect centerpiece of your dream nursery. This timeless crib adds a classic fairytale elegance that is sure to make your little girl feel like the belle of the ball. And it grows effortlessly along with your baby - it has three mattress heights and 5-in-1 convertibility. It can be easily converted into a daybed, toddler bed, and full-size bed (conversion kit, toddler, and bed rail sold separately) - providing you and your child with years of happily ever after. The Aurora crib pairs beautifully with our enchantingly graceful Armoire, Double Dresser, Tall Chest, Hutch/Bookcase, and Nightstand to seamlessly create a magical nursery, the perfect abode for your little princess. Welcome your little princess with the Evolur Aurora 5-in-1 Convertible Crib in Ivory Lace, Blush Pink, Frost White, Akoya Grey (Pearl)/Silver Mist, or Metallic Gold Dust finishes. The Aurora is a true Sleeping Beauty! At Evolur, safety is always our No.1 priority - This crib is Greenguard Gold certified which means that it has been tested for thousands of chemicals and VOCs and helps in providing a safe and healthy environment for your baby and family. Our cribs are built to the highest safety standards that meet/exceed those set by the CPSC, JPMA, and ASTM. Each of our cribs undergoes rigorous testing by independent laboratories for compliance with all US and Canadian crib regulations. For the best mattress fit, we recommend any Dream on Me or Evolur standard, full-size, non-toxic, Greenguard certified crib mattress (sold separately).
